testimonialCard.text: He demonstrates in-depth knowledge of programming and is always ready to help with any technical issues.
testimonialCard.author: Emily Smith

testimonialCard.text: He works efficiently on projects, always keeps to the schedule, and collaborates productively with his colleagues.
testimonialCard.author: Michael Brown

testimonialCard.text: He quickly understood our requirements and efficiently implemented them in high-quality software.
testimonialCard.author: Emily Johnson

testimonialCard.text: This is a developer you can rely on. He always meets the deadlines and ensures high quality of his work meets.
testimonialCard.author: David Wilson

testimonialCard.text: Working with Mykola has been a very positive experience. He not only solves technical problems efficiently.
testimonialCard.author: Sarah Thompson

testimonialCard.text: He carefully studies the requirements and tasks of the project to ensure their successful implementation.
testimonialCard.author: Jessica Davis

testimonialCard.text: He has extensive technical knowledge and excellent analytical skills that allow him to quickly find effective solutions.

testimonialCard.text: He always goes the extra mile to ensure the project is completed successfully. Impressive level of efficiency and enthusiasm.
